job.title: REMOTE Software Developer (Open Pages)
job.industry: Information Services,Information Technology and Services,Financial Services
job.description: <p><strong>Additional Job Details:&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>10-12 years’ work experience.&nbsp;</li><li>6 - 8 years Open Pages required. Certified Preferred. ---Using Version 8.02, but if someone has 7.9 experience and above would be great.&nbsp;</li><li>Workflows, AFCON, AURA experience.&nbsp;</li><li>Must be comfortable and this person will play a lead role to assist with other employees.&nbsp;</li><li>SDLC process and working with QA automation.&nbsp;</li><li>Someone with financial experience would be beneficial.&nbsp;</li><li>Provide OpenPages development (Trigger/Helper, Workflow, BPM, module configuration and customization).&nbsp;</li><li>Provide development support to the management of GRC related projects and scheduled releases.&nbsp;</li><li>Troubleshooting of reported issues related to developed/configured solutions.&nbsp;</li><li>Work with IT and business leads to understand and build development requirements and similar business analysis tasks.&nbsp;</li><li>Advise on possible impacts and outcomes of changes made to the IBM OpenPages solution&nbsp;</li><li>Ensure coordination between the Product owner and tech organizations.&nbsp;</li><li>Knowledge of various QA techniques/automation Tools, Defect management and prioritization&nbsp;.</li></ul>
